sqlMap.select: select * from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where ryid = #ryid# and glzt in (1,3,2,5) and t.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
select * from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where glzt in (1,2,3,5) and zdrygllxdm='7' and t.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and ZJHM= #zjhm# and CYZJDM='111'
select * from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where ID = #id# and rownum = 1
select t.* from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where t.syrkid = #id# and t.glzt in (3,2,1,5) and t.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
select t.* from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where t.id = #zdryid# and t.glzt in (3,2,1,5) and t.XT_ZXBZ = '0'

select rownum r ,m.*,L.BZ as zdrygllxmc,L.FZ,g.jgbmdm ,g.jgbmmc,g.sfsjsp from ( select z.*,r.CYZJDM,r.ZJHM,r.XM,r.XBDM,r.MZDM,r.CSRQ,r.Jzd_dzxz as dz_jzdzxz,b.zbx , b.zby from ZDRY_ZDRYZB z,RY_RYJBXXB r,BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB b where z.ryid = #ryid# and (b.mldzid=r.Jzd_mlpdm or (r.Hjd_mlpdm = b.mldzid and r.Jzd_mlpdm is null)) and r.ID=z.RYID and z.glzt in (1,3,2,5) and z.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and b.xt_zxbz='0'
) m left join ZDRY_ZDRYLXYLBDYB L on (L.LBDM=m.ZDRYGLLXDM and L.QYDM=#QYDM#) left join ZDRY_GLPZPZB g on (m.zdrygllxdm = g.zdrygllxdm and g.xt_zxbz = '0')

select rownum r ,m.*,L.BZ as zdrygllxmc,L.FZ,g.jgbmdm ,g.jgbmmc,g.sfsjsp from ( select z.*,r.CYZJDM,r.ZJHM,r.XM,r.XBDM,r.MZDM,r.CSRQ,r.Jzd_dzxz as dz_jzdzxz,b.zbx , b.zby from ZDRY_ZDRYZB z,RY_RYJBXXB r,BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB b where z.id = #zdryid# and (b.mldzid=r.Jzd_mlpdm or (r.Hjd_mlpdm = b.mldzid and r.Jzd_mlpdm is null)) and r.ID=z.RYID and z.glzt in (1,3,2,5) and z.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and b.xt_zxbz='0'
) m left join ZDRY_ZDRYLXYLBDYB L on (L.LBDM=m.ZDRYGLLXDM and L.QYDM=#QYDM#) left join ZDRY_GLPZPZB g on (m.zdrygllxdm = g.zdrygllxdm and g.xt_zxbz = '0')

select rownum r ,m.*,L.BZ as zdrygllxmc，g.jgbmdm ,g.jgbmmc,g.sfsjsp from ( select z.*,r.CYZJDM,sga.gmsfhm,sga.XM,sga.XBDM,r.MZDM,r.CSRQ,r.Jzd_dzxz as dz_jzdzxz,b.zbx , b.zby from ZDRY_ZDRYZB z,RY_RYJBXXB r,BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB b ,ZDRY_SGAFZDRYXXB sga where z.ryid = #ryid# and z.ryid=r.id and z.id=sga.id and (b.mldzid=sga.Jzd_mlpdm or (r.Hjd_mlpdm = b.mldzid and sga.Jzd_mlpdm is null)) and z.glzt in ('2','6') and z.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and b.xt_zxbz='0') m left join ZDRY_ZDRYLXYLBDYB L on (L.LBDM=m.ZDRYGLLXDM and L.QYDM=#QYDM#) left join ZDRY_GLPZPZB g on (m.zdrygllxdm = g.zdrygllxdm and g.xt_zxbz = '0')
sqlMap.insert:
insert into ZDRY_ZDRYZB (ID ryid zdrylb syrkid zdrygllxdm glzt zywtjxsbx zdlgbmid zdlgbmmc sfjm sfzkdm glbm cxbm
jgssxdm hjd_ssxjgajgdm hjd_sspcsdm hjd_sssq jzd_szdsdm
, ) values (#id# #ryid# #zdrylb# #syrkid# #zdrygllxdm# #glzt# #zywtjxsbx# #zdlgbmid# #zdlgbmmc# #sfjm# #sfzkdm# #glbm# #cxbm#
#jgssxdm# #hjd_ssxjgajgdm# #hjd_sspcsdm# #hjd_sssq# #jzd_szdsdm#
, )
sqlMap.update:
update ZDRY_ZDRYZB
ryid = #ryid# zdrylb = #zdrylb# syrkid = #syrkid# zdrygllxdm = #zdrygllxdm# glzt = #glzt# zywtjxsbx = #zywtjxsbx# zdlgbmid = #zdlgbmid# zdlgbmmc = #zdlgbmmc# sfjm = #sfjm# sfzkdm = #sfzkdm# glbm = #glbm# cxbm = #cxbm# jgssxdm = #jgssxdm# hjd_ssxjgajgdm = #hjd_ssxjgajgdm# hjd_sspcsdm = #hjd_sspcsdm# hjd_sssq = #hjd_sssq# jzd_szdsdm = #jzd_szdsdm#
,
where ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from ZDRY_ZDRYZB z,RY_RYJBXXB r,BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB b where 1=1
z.zdrygllxdm = #zdryZdryzbVO.zdrygllxdm#
r.xm like '%$zdryZdryzbVO.xm$%'
r.zjhm = #zdryZdryzbVO.zjhm#
r.xbdm = #zdryZdryzbVO.xbdm#
r.Jzd_dzxz like '%$zdryZdryzbVO.dz_jzdzxz$%'
z.glbm = #zdryZdryzbVO.glbm#
r.ZJHM || r.XM|| r.Jzd_dzxz like '%' || #zdryZdryzbVO.condition# || '%'
and (b.mldzid=r.Jzd_mlpdm or ((r.Hjd_mlpdm = b.mldzid and r.Jzd_mlpdm is null))) and r.ID=z.RYID and z.glzt in (3,2,5) and z.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and b.xt_zxbz='0'

select * from ( select rownum r ,m.*,L.BZ as zdrygllxmc from ( select z.*,r.CYZJDM,r.ZJHM,r.XM,r.XBDM,r.MZDM,r.CSRQ,r.Jzd_dzxz as dz_jzdzxz,b.zbx , b.zby from ZDRY_ZDRYZB z,RY_RYJBXXB r,BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB b where 1=1
z.zdrygllxdm = #zdryZdryzbVO.zdrygllxdm#
r.xm like '%$zdryZdryzbVO.xm$%'
r.zjhm = #zdryZdryzbVO.zjhm#
r.xbdm = #zdryZdryzbVO.xbdm#
r.Jzd_dzxz like '%$zdryZdryzbVO.dz_jzdzxz$%'
z.glbm = #zdryZdryzbVO.glbm#
r.ZJHM || r.XM|| r.Jzd_dzxz like '%' || #zdryZdryzbVO.condition# || '%'
and (b.mldzid=r.Jzd_mlpdm or ((r.Hjd_mlpdm = b.mldzid and r.Jzd_mlpdm is null))) and r.ID=z.RYID and z.glzt in (3,2,5) and z.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and b.xt_zxbz='0' order by z.$sort$ $order$) m left join ZDRY_ZDRYLXYLBDYB L on (L.LBDM=m.ZDRYGLLXDM and L.QYDM=#QYDM#) where rownum <= #end# ) where r > #begin#

select * from ( select rownum r ,m.*,L.BZ as zdrygllxmc ,g.* from ( select z.*,r.CYZJDM,r.ZJHM,r.XM,r.XBDM,r.MZDM,r.CSRQ,r.Jzd_dzxz as dz_jzdzxz,b.zbx , b.zby from ZDRY_ZDRYZB z,RY_RYJBXXB r,BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB b where 1=1
z.zdrygllxdm = #zdryZdryzbVO.zdrygllxdm#
r.xm like '%$zdryZdryzbVO.xm$%'
r.zjhm = #zdryZdryzbVO.zjhm#
r.xbdm = #zdryZdryzbVO.xbdm#
r.Jzd_dzxz like '%$zdryZdryzbVO.dz_jzdzxz$%'
z.glbm = #zdryZdryzbVO.glbm#
z.xt_zxbz = #zdryZdryzbVO.glzt#
and (b.mldzid=r.Jzd_mlpdm or ((r.Hjd_mlpdm = b.mldzid and r.Jzd_mlpdm is null))) and r.ID=z.RYID and z.glzt in (3,2,5) and z.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and b.xt_zxbz='0' order by z.$sort$ $order$) m left join ZDRY_ZDRYLXYLBDYB L on (L.LBDM=m.ZDRYGLLXDM and L.QYDM=#QYDM#) left join ( select g1.ORGCODE as sszrqdm ,g2.ORGCODE as sspcsdm,g3.ORGCODE as ssfxjdm from ORG_ORGANIZATION g1, ORG_ORGANIZATION g2, ORG_ORGANIZATION g3 where g2.id=g1.PARENTID and g3.id=g2.PARENTID ) g on (g.SSZRQDM = m.glbm) where rownum <= #end#
g.SSZRQDM = #zdryZdryzbVO.sszrqdm#
g.SSPCSDM = #zdryZdryzbVO.sspcsdm#
g.SSFXJDM = #zdryZdryzbVO.ssfxjdm#
) where r > #begin#

select count(*) from ZDRY_ZDRYZB z left join ( select g1.ORGCODE as sszrqdm ,g2.ORGCODE as sspcsdm,g3.ORGCODE as ssfxjdm from ORG_ORGANIZATION g1, ORG_ORGANIZATION g2, ORG_ORGANIZATION g3 where g2.id=g1.PARENTID and g3.id=g2.PARENTID ) g on (g.SSZRQDM = z.glbm) ,RY_RYJBXXB r,BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB b where 1=1
z.zdrygllxdm = #zdryZdryzbVO.zdrygllxdm#
r.xm like '%$zdryZdryzbVO.xm$%'
r.zjhm = #zdryZdryzbVO.zjhm#
r.xbdm = #zdryZdryzbVO.xbdm#
r.Jzd_dzxz like '%$zdryZdryzbVO.dz_jzdzxz$%'
z.glbm = #zdryZdryzbVO.glbm#
z.xt_zxbz = #zdryZdryzbVO.glzt#
g.SSZRQDM = #zdryZdryzbVO.sszrqdm#
g.SSPCSDM = #zdryZdryzbVO.sspcsdm#
g.SSFXJDM = #zdryZdryzbVO.ssfxjdm#
and (b.mldzid=r.Jzd_mlpdm or ((r.Hjd_mlpdm = b.mldzid and r.Jzd_mlpdm is null))) and r.ID=z.RYID and z.glzt in (3,2,5) and z.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and b.xt_zxbz='0'
select srid from sde.st_geometry_columns t where t.table_name=UPPER(#tableName#) and owner=UPPER(#shapeDbName#)
select * from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where syrkid = #syrkid# and zdrygllxdm = #gllx# and XT_ZXBZ = '0' and rownum = 1
select count(1) from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where t.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and t.SYRKID = #syrkId# and (t.GLZT = '1' or t.GLZT = '2' or t.GLZT = '3' or t.GLZT = '5')
